title.raw: 《田叔列傳》 Biography of Tian Shu

sentences.zh: 田叔者，趙陘城人也。

translations.literal: Tian Shu, Zhao Ao city person.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Shu was from Ao city in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 其先，齊田氏苗裔也。

translations.literal: His first, Qi Tian clan sprout descendant.
translations.idiomatic: His ancestors were descendants of the Tian clan of Qi.

sentences.zh: 叔喜劍，學黃老術於樂巨公所。

translations.literal: Shu happy sword, study Huang Lao technique at Yue Ju Gong place.
translations.idiomatic: Shu delighted in swordsmanship and studied Huang-Lao teachings under Master Yue Ju.

sentences.zh: 叔為人刻廉自喜，喜游諸公。

translations.literal: Shu become person strict clean self happy, happy wander various public.
translations.idiomatic: Shu was a person who was strict, clean, and took pleasure in himself, delighting in associating with various nobles.

sentences.zh: 趙人舉之趙相趙午，午言之趙王張敖所，趙王以為郎中。

translations.literal: Zhao people raise him Zhao chancellor Zhao Wu, Wu speak him Zhao king Zhang Ao place, Zhao king with him become lang zhong.
translations.idiomatic: The people of Zhao recommended him to Chancellor Zhao Wu, who spoke of him to King Zhang Ao of Zhao, and the Zhao king made him a palace attendant.

sentences.zh: 數歲，切直廉平，趙王賢之，未及遷。

translations.literal: Several years, sincere straight clean level, Zhao king worthy him, not reach move.
translations.idiomatic: For several years, he was sincere, upright, clean, and fair, and the Zhao king esteemed him but had not yet promoted him.

sentences.zh: 會陳豨反代，漢七年，高祖往誅之，過趙，趙王張敖自持案進食，禮恭甚，高祖箕踞罵之。

translations.literal: Meet Chen Xi rebel Dai, Han seven years, Gao Zu go punish it, pass Zhao, Zhao king Zhang Ao self hold table advance food, ritual respectful very, Gao Zu ji ju curse him.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Xi rebelled in Dai, in Han year 7, Gaozu went to punish him, passing through Zhao. King Zhang Ao personally held the tray and presented food, his ritual very respectful, but Gaozu sat with legs spread and cursed him.

sentences.zh: 是時趙相趙午等數十人皆怒，謂張王曰：「王事上禮備矣，今遇王如是，臣等請為亂。」

translations.literal: This time Zhao chancellor Zhao Wu etc several ten people all angry, speak Zhao king said: "King serve shang ritual complete, now encounter king like this, minister etc please become chaos."
translations.idiomatic: At this time Chancellor Zhao Wu and dozens of others were all angry and said to the Zhao king: "Your Majesty served the emperor with perfect ritual, now he treats Your Majesty like this—we ministers request to rebel."

sentences.zh: 趙王齧指出血，曰：「先人失國，微陛下，臣等當蟲出。

translations.literal: Zhao king bite finger blood, said: "Former person lose state, slight bi xia, minister etc when worm exit.
translations.idiomatic: The Zhao king bit his finger until blood came and said: "Our ancestors lost the state, if not for Your Majesty we ministers would be like worms emerging from the earth.

sentences.zh: 公等柰何言若是！

translations.literal: Gong etc what speak like this!
translations.idiomatic: Why do you gentlemen speak like this!

sentences.zh: 毋復出口矣！」

translations.literal: Not again exit mouth!"
translations.idiomatic: Do not speak of it again!"

sentences.zh: 於是貫高等曰：「王長者，不倍德。」

translations.literal: Then Guan Gao etc said: "Wang long person, not double virtue."
translations.idiomatic: Then Guan Gao and others said: "Your Majesty is a venerable elder, you do not betray virtue."

sentences.zh: 卒私相與謀弒上。

translations.literal: Finally private mutually plot assassinate shang.
translations.idiomatic: Finally they secretly plotted to assassinate the emperor.

sentences.zh: 會事發覺，漢下詔捕趙王及群臣反者。

translations.literal: Meet affair send aware, Han descend edict capture Zhao king and group minister rebel.
translations.idiomatic: The affair was discovered, and Han issued an edict to capture the Zhao king and the ministers who rebelled.

sentences.zh: 於是趙午等皆自殺，唯貫高就系。

translations.literal: Then Zhao Wu etc all self kill, only Guan Gao go tie.
translations.idiomatic: Then Zhao Wu and others all committed suicide, only Guan Gao was arrested.

sentences.zh: 是時漢下詔書：「趙有敢隨王者罪三族。」

translations.literal: This time Han descend edict book: "Zhao have dare follow wang crime three clan."
translations.idiomatic: At this time Han issued an edict: "Any in Zhao who dares follow the king will be punished with three clans."

sentences.zh: 唯孟舒、田叔等十餘人赭衣自髡鉗，稱王家奴，隨趙王敖至長安。

translations.literal: Only Meng Shu, Tian Shu etc ten remain people zhe clothing self shave pin, call wang home slave, follow Zhao king Ao reach Chang An.
translations.idiomatic: Only Meng Shu, Tian Shu and over ten others wore red clothing, shaved their heads and wore cangues, calling themselves the king's household slaves, following King Ao of Zhao to Chang'an.

sentences.zh: 貫高事明白，趙王敖得出，廢為宣平侯，乃進言田叔等十餘人。

translations.literal: Guan Gao affair clear bright, Zhao king Ao can exit, waste become Xuan Ping hou, then advance speak Tian Shu etc ten remain people.
translations.idiomatic: Guan Gao's affair was clear and bright, King Ao of Zhao was able to be released, demoted to Marquis of Xuanping, then he recommended Tian Shu and over ten others.

sentences.zh: 上盡召見，與語，漢廷臣毋能出其右者，上說，盡拜為郡守、諸侯相。

translations.literal: Shang all summon see, with speak, Han court minister no able exit his right, shang shuo, all appoint become jun guard, feudal lord xiang.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor summoned them all for audience and spoke with them—Han court ministers none could surpass them, the emperor was pleased and appointed them all as commandery governors and feudal lord chancellors.

sentences.zh: 叔為漢中守十餘年，會高后崩，諸呂作亂，大臣誅之，立孝文帝。

translations.literal: Shu become Han Zhong guard ten remain years, meet Gao Hou collapse, various Lu make chaos, minister punish them, establish Xiao Wen Di.
translations.idiomatic: Shu served as Hanzhong governor for over ten years. Empress Gao passed away, the various Lu made chaos, ministers executed them, establishing Emperor Wen.

sentences.zh: 孝文帝既立，召田叔問之曰：「公知天下長者乎？」

translations.literal: Xiao Wen Di already establish, summon Tian Shu ask him said: "Gong know tian xia long person?"
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Wen had been established and summoned Tian Shu, asking him: "Do you know the empire's venerable elders?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「臣何足以知之！」

translations.literal: Answer said: "Chen what sufficient know it!"
translations.idiomatic: He replied: "How am I sufficient to know them!"

sentences.zh: 上曰：「公，長者也，宜知之。」

translations.literal: Shang said: "Gong, long person, suitable know it."
translations.idiomatic: The emperor said: "You are a venerable elder yourself, you should know them."

sentences.zh: 叔頓首曰：「故雲中守孟舒，長者也。」

translations.literal: Shu dun shou said: "Old Yun Zhong guard Meng Shu, long person."
translations.idiomatic: Shu bowed his head and said: "The former Yunzhong governor Meng Shu is a venerable elder."

sentences.zh: 是時孟舒坐虜大入塞盜劫，雲中尤甚，免。

translations.literal: This time Meng Shu sit lu big enter sai steal rob, Yun Zhong especially severe, free.
translations.idiomatic: At this time Meng Shu was convicted for captives greatly entering the frontier to steal and rob, Yunzhong especially severe, dismissed.

sentences.zh: 上曰：「先帝置孟舒雲中十餘年矣，虜曾一人，孟舒不能堅守，毋故士卒戰死者數百人。

translations.literal: Shang said: "Former di place Meng Shu Yun Zhong ten remain years, lu once one person, Meng Shu cannot firm guard, no reason shi zu war die several hundred people.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor said: "The former emperor placed Meng Shu in Yunzhong for over ten years. Captives once entered—one person—and Meng Shu could not firmly guard, without reason hundreds of soldiers died in battle.

sentences.zh: 長者固殺人乎？

translations.literal: Long person solid kill person?
translations.idiomatic: Does a venerable elder truly kill people?

sentences.zh: 公何以言孟舒為長者也？」

translations.literal: Gong what with speak Meng Shu become long person?"
translations.idiomatic: Why do you say Meng Shu is a venerable elder?"

sentences.zh: 叔叩頭對曰：「是乃孟舒所以為長者也。

translations.literal: Shu kou tou answer said: "This then Meng Shu so become long person.
translations.idiomatic: Shu knocked his head on the ground and replied: "This is precisely why Meng Shu is a venerable elder.

sentences.zh: 夫貫高等謀反，上下明詔，趙有敢隨張王，罪三族。

translations.literal: Fu Guan Gao etc plot rebel, up down bright edict, Zhao have dare follow Zhang wang, crime three clan.
translations.idiomatic: When Guan Gao and others plotted rebellion, imperial edicts were clear above and below, in Zhao anyone who dared follow King Zhang would be punished with three clans.

sentences.zh: 然孟舒自髡鉗，隨張王敖之所在，欲以身死之，豈自知為雲中守哉！

translations.literal: Yet Meng Shu self shave pin, follow Zhang wang Ao place, desire with body die it, qi self know become Yun Zhong guard!
translations.idiomatic: Yet Meng Shu shaved his head and wore cangue, following King Zhang Ao wherever he went, desiring to die for him with his body—how could he know he would become Yunzhong governor!

sentences.zh: 漢與楚相距，士卒罷敝。

translations.literal: Han with Chu mutually oppose, shi zu stop bi.
translations.idiomatic: Han and Chu opposed each other, soldiers and troops were exhausted and worn.

sentences.zh: 匈奴冒頓新服北夷，來為邊害，孟舒知士卒罷敝，不忍出言，士爭臨城死敵，如子為父，弟為兄，以故死者數百人。

translations.literal: Meng Shu become Yun Zhong guard, barbarian captive enter sai, Meng Shu with troops wait at sai, look barbarian captive not dare enter sai.
translations.idiomatic: Meng Shu became Yunzhong governor, barbarian captives entered the frontier, Meng Shu waited at the frontier with troops, watched as barbarian captives dared not enter the frontier.

sentences.zh: 孟舒豈故驅戰之哉！

translations.literal: Barbarian captive all exit, Shu go back.
translations.idiomatic: Barbarian captives all retreated, Shu returned.

sentences.zh: 是乃孟舒所以為長者也。」

translations.literal: Barbarian captive wait again enter, Shu again wait.
translations.idiomatic: Barbarian captives again entered, Shu again waited.

sentences.zh: 於是上曰：「賢哉孟舒！」

translations.literal: This way three four, barbarian captive know Shu can be with, not dare again enter sai.
translations.idiomatic: This way three or four times, barbarian captives knew Shu could be relied upon, dared not again enter the frontier.

sentences.zh: 復召孟舒以為雲中守。

translations.literal: Gao Hou time, send Meng Shu make ping yang hou.
translations.idiomatic: During Empress Gao's time, she sent Meng Shu to make peace with the Pingyang Marquis.

sentences.zh: 後數歲，叔坐法失官。

translations.literal: Ping yang hou extremely arrogant, Meng Shu not able bend.
translations.idiomatic: The Pingyang Marquis was extremely arrogant, Meng Shu could not bend.

sentences.zh: 梁孝王使人殺故吳相袁盎，景帝召田叔案梁，具得其事，還報。

translations.literal: Gao Hou angry, cut Meng Shu thousand households, free.
translations.idiomatic: Empress Gao was angry, cut Meng Shu's thousand households, dismissed.

sentences.zh: 景帝曰：「梁有之乎？」

translations.literal: Tian Shu become governor, get Meng Shu poor, give him five hundred jin gold, divide half give Meng Shu son.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Shu became governor, saw Meng Shu was poor, gave him five hundred jin of gold, divided half to give to Meng Shu's son.

sentences.zh: 叔對曰：「死罪！

translations.literal: Meng Shu say: "Lord, I formerly become official, get gold use it, now old, not use gold."
translations.idiomatic: Meng Shu said: "Lord, when I formerly became official, I used gold, now I am old, I do not use gold."

sentences.zh: 有之。」

translations.literal: Shu say: "Gold not for you use, for you son use."
translations.idiomatic: Shu said: "The gold is not for you to use, for your son to use."

sentences.zh: 上曰：「其事安在？」

translations.literal: Meng Shu then accept gold, give son.
translations.idiomatic: Meng Shu then accepted the gold, gave it to his son.

sentences.zh: 田叔曰：「上毋以梁事為也。」

translations.literal: Tian Shu son Shu, word Ren, also strict self love, become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Shu's son Shu, courtesy name Ren, also strict with himself and loved, became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 上曰：「何也？」

translations.literal: Ren grandson Wen, word Chang, young become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: Ren's grandson Wen, courtesy name Chang, young became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 曰：「今梁王不伏誅，是漢法不行也；

translations.literal: Chang grandson Lu, word Zhong, young become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: Chang's grandson Lu, courtesy name Zhong, young became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 如其伏法，而太后食不甘味，臥不安席，此憂在陛下也。」

translations.literal: Lu grandson An Guo, word Chang, young become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: Lu's grandson An Guo, courtesy name Chang, young became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 景帝大賢之，以為魯相。

translations.literal: An Guo grandson Sheng, word Zi Chang, young become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: An Guo's grandson Sheng, courtesy name Zi Chang, young became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 魯相初到，民自言相，訟王取其財物百餘人。

translations.literal: Sheng grandson Yan, word Bo Chang, young become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: Sheng's grandson Yan, courtesy name Bo Chang, young became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 田叔取其渠率二十人，各笞五十，餘各搏二十，怒之曰：「王非若主邪？

translations.literal: Yan grandson Guang, word Zi Gong, young become official reach two thousand dan.
translations.idiomatic: Yan's grandson Guang, courtesy name Zi Gong, young became official reaching two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 何自敢言若主！」

translations.literal: What self dare speak like lord!
translations.idiomatic: How dare I speak of such a lord!

sentences.zh: 魯王聞之大慚，發中府錢，使相償之。

translations.literal: Lu wang hear very shame, send middle fu money, make xiang repay it.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Lu heard and was greatly ashamed, sent money from the inner treasury, had the chancellor repay it.

sentences.zh: 相曰：「王自奪之，使相償之，是王為惡而相為善也。

translations.literal: Xiang say: "Wang self take it, make xiang repay it, this wang become evil yet xiang become good.
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "The king himself took it, had the chancellor repay it—this is the king doing evil while the chancellor does good.

sentences.zh: 相毋與償之。」

translations.literal: Xiang not with repay it."
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor will not repay it with him."

sentences.zh: 於是王乃盡償之。

translations.literal: Then wang then all repay it.
translations.idiomatic: Then the king completely repaid it.

sentences.zh: 魯王好獵，相常從入苑中，王輒休相就館舍，相出，常暴坐待王苑外。

translations.literal: Lu wang good hunt, xiang constant follow enter garden middle, wang then rest xiang go to guan she, xiang out, constant violent sit wait wang garden outer.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Lu enjoyed hunting, the chancellor constantly followed him into the garden, the king would rest while the chancellor went to the guesthouse, when the chancellor came out, he constantly sat exposed waiting for the king outside the garden.

sentences.zh: 王數使人請相休，終不休，曰：「我王暴露苑中，我獨何為就舍！」

translations.literal: Wang several make person please xiang rest, end not rest, said: "I wang expose garden middle, I alone what become go to she!"
translations.idiomatic: The king several times sent people to ask the chancellor to rest, he ultimately would not rest, saying: "My king is exposed in the garden, why should I alone go to the quarters!"

sentences.zh: 魯王以故不大出游。

translations.literal: 王嘉之，遂不亂行矣。
translations.idiomatic: The king esteemed him, then did not behave recklessly.

sentences.zh: 數年，叔以官卒，魯以百金祠，少子仁不受也，曰：「不以百金傷先人名。」

translations.literal: 相曰：「臣有愚計，願王納之。」
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "I have a foolish plan, I hope the king will accept it."

sentences.zh: 仁以壯健為衛將軍舍人，數從擊匈奴。

translations.literal: 相曰：「今魯國之處女有姿色者，宜多遣入王宮。
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "Now among the unmarried women of Lu state with beauty, it is proper to send many into the king's palace.

sentences.zh: 衛將軍進言仁，仁為郎中。

translations.literal: 無複游於民間。」
translations.idiomatic: Do not again roam among the people."

sentences.zh: 數歲，為二千石丞相長史，失官。

translations.literal: 王許之，乃下令曰：「寡人有所取者，皆謝之。」
translations.idiomatic: The king permitted it, then issued an order saying: "Anyone I take, all refuse it."

sentences.zh: 其後使刺舉三河。

translations.literal: 乃使人說王后曰：「入皆願得呂太尉女為妃。」
translations.idiomatic: Then he sent someone to persuade the queen: "Everyone wishes to get the daughter of Grand Commandant Lu as consort."

sentences.zh: 上東巡，仁奏事有辭，上說，拜為京輔都尉。

translations.literal: 王后許，乃以呂太尉女為王后，王后呂姓也。
translations.idiomatic: The queen permitted it, so made the daughter of Grand Commandant Lu the queen consort, the Queen's surname was Lu.

sentences.zh: 月餘，上遷拜為司直。

translations.literal: 王欲置酒，引之坐，曰：「臣有所為，願王納之。」
translations.idiomatic: The king wished to set up a feast, drew him to sit, said: "I have something to do, I hope the king will accept it."

sentences.zh: 數歲，坐太子事。

translations.literal: 王曰：「何如？」
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "What is it like?"

sentences.zh: 時左相自將兵，令司直田仁主閉守城門，坐縱太子，下吏誅死。

translations.literal: 相曰：「今羣臣就舍，臣請悉以王邑分賜羣臣。」
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "Now the assembled ministers are at quarters, I request to completely divide the king's fiefs to grant to the assembled ministers."

sentences.zh: 仁發兵，長陵令車千秋上變仁，仁族死。

translations.literal: 王曰：「何為其然？」
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Why do it like that?"

sentences.zh: 陘城今在中山國。

translations.literal: 相曰：「夫羣臣為主守壹者，或重於千乘，或輕於百乘。
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "The assembled ministers guarding for their lord, some are heavier than thousand chariots, some lighter than hundred chariots.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：孔子稱曰「居是國必聞其政」，田叔之謂乎！

translations.literal: 今王將滅羣臣之屬以自封，羣臣必皆愛王如父母。」
translations.idiomatic: Now the king will destroy the ministers' lineages to seal himself, the assembled ministers will certainly all love the king like parents."

sentences.zh: 義不忘賢，明主之美以救過。

translations.literal: 王乃發十餘縣封羣臣，羣臣皆再拜受之。
translations.idiomatic: The king then issued over ten counties to seal the assembled ministers, the assembled ministers all bowed twice and received it.

sentences.zh: 仁與余善，余故并論之。

translations.literal: 於是羣臣喜，王亦無有子嗣。
translations.idiomatic: Then the assembled ministers were happy, the king also had no heirs.

sentences.zh: 褚先生曰：臣為郎時，聞之曰田仁故與任安相善。

translations.literal: 相曰：「羣臣之喜，以王為實；羣臣愛王，以王為實。
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "The assembled ministers' happiness is because the king is substantial; the assembled ministers' love for the king is because the king is substantial.

sentences.zh: 任安，滎陽人也。

translations.literal: 今羣臣見王無子而喜，是以王為實也。」
translations.idiomatic: Now the assembled ministers see the king has no sons and are happy—this is considering the king substantial."

sentences.zh: 少孤貧困，為人將車之長安，留，求事為小吏，未有因緣也，因占著名數。

translations.literal: 王曰：「為之柰何？」
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "What to do about it?"

sentences.zh: 武功，扶風西界小邑也，谷口蜀道近山。

translations.literal: 相曰：「王欲為善，而羣臣喜王無子，是羣臣皆欲代王也。
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "The king wishes to do good, yet the assembled ministers are happy the king has no sons—this is the assembled ministers all wishing to replace the king.

sentences.zh: 安以為武功小邑，無豪，易高也，安留，代人為求盜亭父。

translations.literal: 王不如為惡以誅之。」
translations.idiomatic: The king should rather do evil to execute them."

sentences.zh: 後為亭長。

translations.literal: 王曰：「善。」
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Good."

sentences.zh: 邑中人民俱出獵，任安常為人分麋鹿雉兔，部署老小當壯劇易處，眾人皆喜，曰：「無傷也，任少卿分別平，有智略。」

translations.literal: 乃賜羣臣以美田宅，而復收其縣。
translations.idiomatic: Then he granted the assembled ministers beautiful fields and houses, then again took back their counties.

sentences.zh: 明日復合會，會者數百人。

translations.literal: 羣臣怨之，果作亂，殺王后及太子。
translations.idiomatic: The assembled ministers resented it, indeed rebelled, killed the queen and crown prince.

sentences.zh: 任少卿曰：「某子甲何為不來乎？」

translations.literal: 王怪相曰：「今羣臣怨我而殺我后太子，何也？」
translations.idiomatic: The king blamed the chancellor saying: "Now the assembled ministers resent me and killed my queen and crown prince, why?"

sentences.zh: 諸人皆怪其見之疾也。

translations.literal: 相曰：「王欲為善，而羣臣喜王無子；王欲為惡，而羣臣殺王后太子。
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: "The king wished to do good, yet the assembled ministers were happy the king had no sons; the king wished to do evil, yet the assembled ministers killed the king's queen and crown prince.

sentences.zh: 其後除為三老，舉為親民，出為三百石長，治民。

translations.literal: 羣臣之為人臣也，甚於桀紂。」
translations.idiomatic: The assembled ministers as subjects are worse than Jie and Zhou."

sentences.zh: 坐上行出游共帳不辦，斥免。

translations.literal: 王乃誅羣臣而自立嗣子。
translations.idiomatic: The king then executed the assembled ministers and established his own heir.

sentences.zh: 乃為衛將軍舍人，與田仁會，俱為舍人，居門下，同心相愛。

translations.literal: 相後去魯，以為東海太守。
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor later left Lu, became Donghai governor.

sentences.zh: 此二人家貧，無錢用以事將軍家監，家監使養惡齧馬。

translations.literal: 數年，以官卒。
translations.idiomatic: Several years later, died in office.

sentences.zh: 兩人同床臥，仁竊言曰：「不知人哉家監也！」

translations.literal: 太史公曰：「天叔之為魯相也，豈將有以沒世乎？
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: "Tian Shu's service as Lu chancellor, was it not to pass away with something?

sentences.zh: 任安曰：「將軍尚不知人，何乃家監也！」

translations.literal: 其智足以知之，而深藏之；其術足以行之，而獨用之。
translations.idiomatic: His wisdom was sufficient to know it, yet he deeply concealed it; his methods were sufficient to implement it, yet he used them alone.

sentences.zh: 衛將軍從此兩人過平陽主，主家令兩人與騎奴同席而食，此二子拔刀列斷席別坐。

translations.literal: 雖其身死，後世必曰『魯相天叔』者，以其術使魯王自殺云。」
translations.idiomatic: Though his body died, later generations will certainly say 'Lu Chancellor Tian Shu' because he used his methods to make the King of Lu kill himself."

sentences.zh: 主家皆怪而惡之，莫敢呵。

translations.literal: 田叔之子仁，為衛尉。
translations.idiomatic: Tian Shu's son Ren became Commander of the Guards.

sentences.zh: 其後有詔募擇衛將軍舍人以為郎，將軍取舍人中富給者，令具鞌馬絳衣玉具劍，欲入奏之。

translations.literal: 景帝時，至九卿。
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Jing's time, reached the Nine Ministers.

sentences.zh: 會賢大夫少府趙禹來過衛將軍，將軍呼所舉舍人以示趙禹。

translations.literal: 元朔中，薨。
translations.idiomatic: In the middle of Yuanshuo, passed away.

sentences.zh: 趙禹以次問之，十餘人無一人習事有智略者。

translations.literal: 子順，為丞相。
translations.idiomatic: His son Shun became Chancellor.

sentences.zh: 趙禹曰：「吾聞之，將門之下必有將類。

translations.literal: 順為丞相，坐酎金失侯。
translations.idiomatic: Shun as Chancellor, convicted for brew gold lost marquisate.

sentences.zh: 傳曰『不知其君視其所使，不知其子視其所友』。

translations.literal: 子嬰，字子公，為太僕。
translations.idiomatic: His son Ying, courtesy name Zi Gong, became Grand Coachman.

sentences.zh: 今有詔舉將軍舍人者，欲以觀將軍而能得賢者文武之士也。

translations.literal: 坐酎金，免。
translations.idiomatic: Convicted for brew gold, dismissed.

sentences.zh: 今徒取盎人子上之，又無智略，如木偶人衣之綺繡耳，將柰之何？」

translations.literal: 嬰弟子慶忌，為鉅鹿太守。
translations.idiomatic: Ying's younger brother disciple Qing Ji became Julu governor.

sentences.zh: 於是趙禹悉召衛將軍舍人百餘人，以次問之，得田仁、任安，曰：「獨此兩人可耳，餘無可用者。」

translations.literal: 慶忌弟子安世，為御史大夫。
translations.idiomatic: Qing Ji's younger brother disciple An Shi became Imperial Secretary.

sentences.zh: 衛將軍見此兩人貧，意不平。

translations.literal: 安世弟子邯鄲，為鉅鹿太守。
translations.idiomatic: An Shi's younger brother disciple Handan became Julu governor.

sentences.zh: 趙禹去，謂兩人曰：「各自具樾象絳衣。」

translations.literal: Zhao Yu go, speak two people said: "Each self prepare yu zhang jiang clothing."
translations.idiomatic: Zhao Yu left, said to the two: "Each prepare your own red clothing and shackles."

sentences.zh: 兩人對曰：「家貧無用具也。」

translations.literal: Two people answer said: "Home poor no use prepare."
translations.idiomatic: The two replied: "We are poor at home and have no equipment."

sentences.zh: 將軍怒曰：「今兩君家自為貧，何為出此言？

translations.literal: General angry said: "Now two jun home self become poor, what become exit this speak?
translations.idiomatic: The general angrily said: "Now you two gentlemen's homes are themselves poor, why speak like this?

sentences.zh: 鞅鞅如有移德於我者，何也？」

translations.literal: Yang yang like have move virtue at I, what?"
translations.idiomatic: Irritated as if someone has transferred virtue to me, why?"

sentences.zh: 將軍不得已，上籍以聞。

translations.literal: General not get already, shang register with hear.
translations.idiomatic: The general had no choice, submitted the register to report it.

sentences.zh: 有詔召見衛將軍舍人，此二人前見，詔問能略相推第也。

translations.literal: Have zhao summon see wei general she ren, this two people front see, zhao ask able lue xiang tui di.
translations.idiomatic: There was an edict summoning to see the Wei general's retainers, these two appeared before him, the edict asked who could roughly evaluate and rank them.

sentences.zh: 田仁對曰；

translations.literal: Tian Ren answer said;
translations.idiomatic: Tian Ren replied:

sentences.zh: 「提桴鼓立軍門，使士大夫樂死戰鬬，仁不及任安。」

translations.literal: "Ti fu gu stand army gate, make shi da fu le die battle fight, Ren not reach Ren An."
translations.idiomatic: "Raising the drumsticks to stand at the army gate, making the officers and gentlemen happily die in battle, Ren is not as good as Ren An."

sentences.zh: 任安對曰：「夫決嫌疑，定是非，辯治官，使百姓無怨心，安不及仁也。」

translations.literal: Ren An answer said: "Fu decide suspect, fix shi fei, bian govern official, make people no resent heart, An not reach Ren."
translations.idiomatic: Ren An replied: "Deciding suspicions, fixing right and wrong, clearly governing officials, making the people have no resentful hearts, An is not as good as Ren."

sentences.zh: 武帝大笑曰：「善。」

translations.literal: Wu Di big laugh said: "Shan."
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Wu greatly laughed saying: "Good."

sentences.zh: 使任安護北軍，使田仁護邊田穀於河上。

translations.literal: Make Ren An protect north army, make Tian Ren protect border field valley at river shang.
translations.idiomatic: He had Ren An protect the northern army, had Tian Ren protect the border fields and grain at the river.

sentences.zh: 此兩人立名天下。

translations.literal: This two people stand name tian xia.
translations.idiomatic: These two established their names throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 其後用任安為益州刺史，以田仁為丞相長史。

translations.literal: Its after use Ren An become Yi Zhou ci shi, with Tian Ren become cheng xiang chang shi.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward he used Ren An as Yizhou inspector, and Tian Ren as chancellor's chief clerk.

sentences.zh: 田仁上書言：「天下郡太守多為姦利，三河尤甚，臣請先刺舉三河。

translations.literal: Tian Ren shang book speak: "Tian xia jun tai shou many become jian li, three river especially severe, chen please first ci ju three river.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Ren submitted a memorial saying: "The empire's commandery governors many become corrupt and profit-seeking, the Three Rivers especially severe, I request to first investigate and expose the Three Rivers.

sentences.zh: 三河太守皆內倚中貴人，與三公有親屬，無所畏憚，宜先正三河以警天下姦吏。」

translations.literal: Three river tai shou all nei yi zhong gui ren, with three gong have close relative, no place wei dan, suitable first correct three river with warn tian xia jian li."
translations.idiomatic: The Three Rivers governors all internally rely on favored courtiers, have close relatives with the Three Excellencies, have nothing to fear, it is proper to first correct the Three Rivers to warn the empire's corrupt officials."

sentences.zh: 是時河南、河內太守皆御史大夫杜父兄子弟也，河東太守石丞相子孫也。

translations.literal: This time He Nan, He Nei tai shou all yu shi da fu Du Fu brother son brother, He Dong tai shou Shi cheng xiang son grandson.
translations.idiomatic: At this time the Henan and Henan governors were all brothers' sons of Imperial Secretary Du Fu, the Hedong governor was Chancellor Shi's son and grandson.

sentences.zh: 是時石氏九人為二千石，方盛貴。

translations.literal: This time Shi shi nine people become two thousand dan, just sheng gui.
translations.idiomatic: At this time the Shi clan had nine people as two thousand dan officials, just flourishing and noble.

sentences.zh: 田仁數上書言之。

translations.literal: Tian Ren shu shang book speak it.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Ren repeatedly submitted memorials speaking of it.

sentences.zh: 杜大夫及石氏使人謝，謂田少卿曰：「吾非敢有語言也，願少卿無相誣汙也。」

translations.literal: Du da fu and Shi shi make person thank, speak Tian shao qing said: "I non gan have language, wish shao qing no xiang wu wu."
translations.idiomatic: Du the Grandee and the Shi clan sent people to apologize, saying to Tian Shaoqing: "We dare not have words, we hope Shaoqing does not slander us."

sentences.zh: 仁已刺三河，三河太守皆下吏誅死。

translations.literal: Ren already ci three river, three river tai shou all descend li punish die.
translations.idiomatic: Ren already investigated the Three Rivers, the Three Rivers governors all were sent to the officials and executed.

sentences.zh: 仁還奏事，武帝說，以仁為能不畏彊御，拜仁為丞相司直，威振天下。

translations.literal: Ren return memorial affairs, Wu Di shuo, with Ren become able not wei qiang yu, appoint Ren become cheng xiang si zhi, wei zhen tian xia.
translations.idiomatic: Ren returned to memorialize affairs, Emperor Wu was pleased, considered Ren able not to fear the powerful favorites, appointed Ren as Chancellor's Rectifier, his prestige shook the empire.

sentences.zh: 其後逢太子有兵事，丞相自將兵，使司直主城門。

translations.literal: Its after feng crown prince have troops affair, cheng xiang self lead troops, make si zhi main city gate.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward when the crown prince had military affairs, the chancellor personally led troops, had the Rectifier guard the city gates.

sentences.zh: 司直以為太子骨肉之親，父子之閒不甚欲近，去之諸陵過。

translations.literal: Si zhi with crown prince bone meat close relative, father son interval not very desire near, go it various mausoleum pass.
translations.idiomatic: The Rectifier considered the crown prince bone and flesh kin, between father and son not greatly desiring closeness, had him go pass the various mausoleums.

sentences.zh: 是時武帝在甘泉，使御史大夫暴君下責丞相「何為縱太子」，丞相對言「使司直部守城門而開太子」。

translations.literal: This time Wu Di at Gan Quan, make yu shi da fu Bao Jun descend blame cheng xiang "what become zong crown prince", cheng xiang answer speak "make si zhi bu shou city gate yet open crown prince".
translations.idiomatic: At this time Emperor Wu was at Ganquan, had Imperial Secretary Bao Jun descend to blame the chancellor "why release the crown prince", the chancellor replied "had the Rectifier guard the city gates but opened them for the crown prince".

sentences.zh: 上書以聞，請捕系司直。

translations.literal: Shang book with hear, please catch tie si zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Submitted the memorial to report it, requested to arrest and bind the Rectifier.

sentences.zh: 司直下吏，誅死。

translations.literal: Si zhi descend li, punish die.
translations.idiomatic: The Rectifier was sent to officials, executed.

sentences.zh: 是時任安為北軍使者護軍，太子立車北軍南門外，召任安，與節令發兵。

translations.literal: This time Ren An become north army make messenger protect army, crown prince stand chariot north army south gate outer, summon Ren An, with jie make send troops.
translations.idiomatic: At this time Ren An served as northern army envoy protecting the army, the crown prince set up his chariot outside the northern army south gate, summoned Ren An, gave him the tally to order troop dispatch.

sentences.zh: 安拜受節，入，閉門不出。

translations.literal: An bai receive jie, enter, close gate not out.
translations.idiomatic: An bowed and received the tally, entered, closed the gate and did not come out.

sentences.zh: 武帝聞之，以為任安為詳邪，不傅事，何也？

translations.literal: Wu Di hear, with Ren An become xiang xie, not fu affair, what?
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Wu heard of it, considered Ren An hypocritical, not carrying out affairs, why?

sentences.zh: 任安笞辱北軍錢官小吏，小吏上書言之，以為受太子節，言「幸與我其鮮好者」。

translations.literal: Ren An chi ru north army money official small li, small li shang book speak it, with receive crown prince jie, speak "fortunate with I its xian good".
translations.idiomatic: Ren An beat and humiliated the northern army pay officer minor officials, the minor officials submitted memorial speaking of it, saying he received the crown prince's tally, saying "fortunately give me some fresh meat".

sentences.zh: 書上聞，武帝曰：「是老吏也，見兵事起，欲坐觀成敗，見勝者欲合從之，有兩心。

translations.literal: Book shang hear, Wu Di said: "This old li, see troops affair rise, desire sit watch become defeat, see win desire he from it, have two heart.
translations.idiomatic: The memorial was submitted and heard, Emperor Wu said: "This is an old official, seeing military affairs arise, desiring to sit and watch success or failure, seeing victory desiring to join with it, having two hearts.

sentences.zh: 安有當死之罪甚眾，吾常活之，今懷詐，有不忠之心。」

translations.literal: An have should die crime very many, I constant live it, now bosom zha, have not loyal heart."
translations.idiomatic: An has many crimes deserving death, I constantly spared him, now harboring deceit, having disloyal heart."

sentences.zh: 下安吏，誅死。

translations.literal: Descend An li, punish die.
translations.idiomatic: Sent An to officials, executed.

sentences.zh: 夫月滿則虧，物盛則衰，天地之常也。

translations.literal: Fu month full then kui, thing sheng then decline, tian di constant.
translations.idiomatic: The moon when full then wanes, things when flourishing then decline, heaven and earth's constant way.

sentences.zh: 知進而不知退，久乘富貴，禍積為祟。

translations.literal: Know advance yet not know retreat, long multiply rich noble, huo ji become sui.
translations.idiomatic: Knowing advance but not knowing retreat, long enjoying wealth and nobility, calamity accumulates to become disaster.

sentences.zh: 故范蠡之去越，辭不受官位，名傳後世，萬歲不忘，豈可及哉！

translations.literal: Therefore Fan Li go Yue, ci not receive official position, name transmit after world, wan sui not forget, qi able reach!
translations.idiomatic: Therefore Fan Li left Yue, declined not to receive official position, his name transmitted to later generations, ten thousand years not forgotten, how can it be reached!

sentences.zh: 後進者慎戒之。

translations.literal: After advance careful warn it.
translations.idiomatic: Later advancers take care and warn of it.
